arts.ttl: Napoli visit Venezia to temporarily take top spot
arts.sum: Venezia have only lost two of their last seven home League matches (W1 D4), against Inter and Roma – without scoring in their two most recent ones; furthermore, the Lagunari could record at least three goalless games played at Penzo in Serie A for the first time since the period between May 2000 and November 2001 (five ones in that case). Napoli have lost four of their last six games played at 12:30 p.m. in Serie A (W1 D1) – including the two most recent ones (vs Atalanta and Como); the Partenopei never lost three matches in a row in this game time in the top-flight.
